Keywords: Infinity Watch , Monster , Ruler , Scientist
Real Name: Harvey Elder
Special Powers
MOVEMENT: Hindering
BOSS MONSTER OF SUBTERRANEA: Leadership, Mastermind. When Mole Man uses Leadership and succeeds, instead of the normal effect, you may generate two [F4] #008 Moloids in any squares within range.
DENIZENS OF THE UNDERWORLD, HEED MY COMMANDS!: Perplex. When Mole Man would use it to target a friendly character with the Monster keyword, he does not need range or line of fire.

February 20, 2021
Goop
Basically you put him in stealth and harass with energy explosion as much as you can. If they send any melee over to you, you simply mastermind the damage away and hit back with big moloid empowered swings. He's not the kind of guy you build an entire team around but him and some moloids are a nice addition to a monster theme.
July 25, 2020
tidge
Mole Man looks forward to riding his Hellcow into battle against the forces of the surface world!
